General.Name: Pipestone Energy Corp
General.Description: Pipestone Energy Corp. engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil, natural gas liquids, and natural gas in Western Canada. It offers natural gas liquids comprising condensate, pentane, butane, propane, and ethane. The company focuses on the Montney asset that covers an area of 90,029 net acres located to southwest of Grande Prairie in Northwest Alberta. Pipestone Energy Corp. was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
